### GV.RR-01: Leadership accountability <a data-external href="/docs/functions/govern/roles-responsibilities#gvrr-01-leadership-accountability"><SquareArrowOutUpRight size={14} /></a>

Ensure organizational leadership is accountable for cybersecurity risk and fosters a risk-aware culture.
